values:
Welcome to OddBall Layouts

This is one of the coolest places to get layouts. Layouts are purely made from request, and they're really easy to obtain. I make everything from scratch and do not use already made backgrounds, so you guarenteed to have a completly original journal layout! I make whatever you want, and use whatever you want, just tell me! Make sure you see the rules before you take anything. Have fun, follow rules, and request!

Love,
OddBall
Layouts

Requests
Rules: o1. Please Promote o2. Comment on this entry ONLY. Otherwise, I will never see your request. o3. Tell me what the theme will be, (roses, music, kittens, fashion ect.) or the link to another journal that you would like to have a similar layout to. o4. Tell me what colors you would like. - important o5. I'm not very good at comming up with creative comment links, so please leave an idea for them. Or, be happy with what I give you. ;) o7. Be patient. Many people request, I have a long list. However, I guarantee EVERYONE who makes a request will get a layout. Promise. :) o8. Due to the amount of request I have been getting, I'm asking for a $5 donation. Please send $5 in a birthday card, or well concealed. This will garentee your layout to be made, and I'll make it just how you want. I'm starting to rush through them so I can finish, but if you give me $5, I'll definently make sure it's worth it.
Allright! That's all the rules. Request away!

Layouts
Rules: o1. Before you even mess with customization, copy and paste the layout codes in Notepad. Hit Controll-H and in the "Find What:" space type in "Username", and in the "Replace With:" space type in your username. None of the links will work unless you do this. 02. Then, make sure you have a Webpage URL and Webpage Name filled out in your User Info. If you don't do this, the background will not show up. (If you don't have a webpage, just fill in any random site) o3. Set your journal on the S1 style. o4. Your Page Layout Style needs to be set on Generator o5. The Color Theme box needs to match the one given with the layout you chose. If you don't do this, the colors and backgrounds will be majorly screwed up. 06. If something still doesn't look quite right, comment describing exacly what is wrong. If you don't explain clearly enough, I won't be able to fix it. Also, don't complain if you didn't follow the rules. Before you even think about commenting with a problem, make sure you've done everything in the rules.
Yay! Done with rules! Now go pick out a layout! :) Minnie Screen Shots Click the screen shot for the full layout.

Thank you so much!!!

BANNERS!
